Comment.value:
10 - Learn of alpha wolf
20 - Alpha wolf gives quest
30 - Pups rescued
40 - Pups killed
50 - Alpha wolf killed

10 - Learn of a Lost Leader from the Spirits
20 - Hear her sobs at the cave entrance
30 - Scrivener carves her name, identifying her as Aribeth.
40 - See her frozen form in the cave
50 - 1-berry fire not enough
60 - 2-berry fire not enough
70 - She thaws and attacks
80 - She surrenders
90 - Player steers her toward good
100 - Player steers her toward evil

10 - Player sees first spirit getting yoinked in a cutscene.
20 - Player asks about the spirit who was previously yoinked.

10 - Hear of Arden
20 - Talk to Arden
30 - Arden mentions plans to wake the Sleeping Man using the trumpet
40 - Arden explains gambling rules for winning trumpet
50 - Player wins trumpet from Arden
60 - Player pickpockets trumpet from Arden
70 - Player kills Arden and acquires trumpet.
80 - Wake the Sleeping Man using the trumpet (Pre-Names)

10 - Module OnEnter
20 - Gatekeeper mentions True Name
30 - Someone recommends Sleeping Man
40 - Player learns of ring & Knowers from Sleeping Man
50 - Player equips completed ring & experiences 'ring-vision'.
60 - Knower of Places upgrades the ring so it leads to Knower of Names.
70 - Knower of Names reveals Gatekeeper's True Name.
80 - Gatekeeper creates portal to Waterdeep.
90 - Player meets Durnan
100 - Mephistopheles appears, Durnan retreats.
110 - Player deals with Mephistopheles.

10 - First crystal cutscene viewed.
20 - Second crystal cutscene viewed.
30 - Third crystal cutscene viewed.

10 - Learn of Pilgrims congregating in the tavern
20 - Talk to Pilgrims about Sensei
30 - Learn of Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man from Sensei
40 - 1 Mystery learned
50 - 2 Mysteries learned
60 - 3 Mysteries learned
70 - 4 Mysteries learned
80 - 5 Mysteries learned
90 - Door to Inner Sanctum opened
100 - Mysteries successfully recited, amulet received
110 - Sensei killed prior to Sleeping Man, amulet received
120 - Amulet use failed
130 - Amulet use succeeded
140 - Sleeping Man dreams of ring and the Knowers
150 - Woke Sleeping Man (Pre-Names)
160 - Attacked by Sensei, amulet received
170 - Sleeping Man tells of ring and the Knowers.

10 - Learn of Guardians from Sleeping Man (Asleep)
20 - Learn of Guardians from Sleeping Man (Awake)
30 - First Guardian dead
40 - Second Guardian dead
50 - Third Guardian dead

10 - People mention Gru'ul the Quarry Boss
20 - Gru'ul gives Grinder quest
30 - Player takes grinder apart to free Lazy
40 - Player can't put the grinder back together
50 - Gru'ul demands 50,000 gp for repairs
60 - Gru'ul demands 30,000 gp for repairs
70 - Player succeeds in putting the grinder back together
80 - Player feeds Lazy through grinder.
90 - Player convinces Gru'ul to declare holidays
100 - Gru'ul offers store.
110 - Gru'ul dead.

10 - Learn the question
20 - Learn the answer from Aribeth
30 - Learn the answer from the Gatekeeper
40 - Player enters Inner Sanctum

10 - Learn the question
20 - Learn the answer from Gru'ul
30 - Learn the answer from the Sensei
40 - Player enters Inner Sanctum

10 - Learn the question
20 - Learn the answer from the Sensei's Tome
30 - Learn the answer from Arden Swift
40 - Player enters Inner Sanctum

10 - Mimic stole clothes off your back
20 - Mimic stole clothes from your pack
30 - Mimic stole miscellaneous items from your pack
40 - Mimic defeated

10 - Platform found
20 - Prisoner freed
30 - Ring found

10 - Found Lightning Door Puzzle
20 - Lightning Door Puzzle Solved
30 - Found Ear Puzzle
40 - Found Gargoyle with missing ears
50 - Ears Replaced
55 - Gongs Triggered
60 - Ear Puzzle solved

10 - Learn of Scrivener
20 - Talk to Scrivener outside of Cave
30 - First rebus puzzle
40 - Second rebus puzzle
50 - Third rebus puzzle
60 - Carves Aribeth's name
70 - Scrivener dead.

10 - Learn the question
20 - Learn the answer from Generic Devils
30 - Learn the answer from the Scrivener
40 - Player enters Inner Sanctum

10 - Amulet first examined
20 - Amulet's shape-shifting properties first revealed.

10 - Learn the question
20 - Learn the answer from Generic Ghosts
30 - Learn the answer from Generic Pilgrims
40 - Player enters Inner Sanctum

10 - Learned Arden Swift's True Name
20 - Used it to make him give you all his winnings.
30 - Used it to make him pick a fight with the tavernkeeper.
40 - Used it to make him write an epic song about you and spread your fame throughout the planes.
50 - Arden is dead.

10 - Learned Aribeth's True Name
20 - Used it to prevent end battle betrayal
30 - Used it to help good Aribeth atone for her sins in Neverwinter
40 - Used it to make her evil rather than good.
50 - Used it to make her good rather than evil.
60 - Used it to make her surrender her soul to you.
70 - Used it to force the romance.
80 - Sold it to Gru'ul, condemning her to eternal slavery.

10 - Learned Deekin's True Name
20 - Used it to prevent end battle betrayal
30 - Used it to make him believe in himself
40 - Used it to make him surrender his soul to you
60 - Sold it to Gru'ul, condemning him to eternal slavery

10 - Learned Gru'ul's True Name
20 - Used it to force Gru'ul to be good
30 - Used it to force Gru'ul to show you his store
40 - Used it to force Gru'ul to declare a holiday in your name
50 - Used it to force Gru'ul to give you special item that he was only going to give you in exchange for the names of your henchmen.
60 - Gru'ul is dead.

10 - Learned Knower of Names' True Name
20 - Used it to obtain Mephistopheles' True Name
30 - Used it to make her visit the Sleeping Man

10 - Learned Knower of Places' True Name
20 - PC returns to her lair with her name, finding it empty

10 - Learned Mephistopheles' True Name
20 - Used it to Stop him
30 - Used it to Join him
40 - Used it to Replace him
50 - Used it to force a battle

10 - Learned Nathyrra's True Name
20 - Used it to prevent end battle betrayal
30 - Used it to make her forgive herself
40 - Used it to make her surrender her soul to you
50 - Used it to force the romance
60 - Sold it to Gru'ul, condemning her to eternal slavery

10 - Learned Gatekeeper's True Name
20 - Used it to send the Pilgrims home
30 - Used it to allow the Spirits of the Dead to haunt the living
40 - Used it to loose the Devils upon the planes
50 - Used it to return home to Waterdeep

10 - Learned Sensei Dharvana's True Name
20 - Used it to make her wake the Sleeping Man (not true love)
30 - Used it to make her wake the Sleeping Man (true love)
40 - Used it to make her abandon the Sleeping Man
50 - Used it to force a reconciliation between her and Arden
60 - Sensei is dead.

10 - Learned Sleeping Man's True Name
20 - Used it to wake him
25 - Used it to make him leave the city
30 - Used it to make him abandon his quest
35 - Used it to make him fight the Sensei
40 - Used it to make him believe someone else is his one true love
50 - Sleeping Man is dead

10 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Player)
20 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Aribeth)
30 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Sensei)
40 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Nathyrra)
50 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Knower of Places)
60 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Knower of Names)
70 - Learned True Name of Sleeping Man's one true love (Lavoreal)
80 - Told it to him
90 - Told her
100 - Lied to him and told him it was someone else
110 - Lied to her and told her it was someone else
120 - Sleeping Man's one true love is dead
130 - Sleeping Man is dead

10 - Learned Valen's True Name
20 - Used it to prevent end battle betrayal
30 - Used it to force plot action X
40 - Used it to make him surrender his soul to you
50 - Used it to force the romance
60 - Sold it to Gru'ul, condemning him to eternal slavery

10 - Learned True Name of your one true love (Aribeth)
20 - Learned True Name of your one true love (Nathyrra)
30 - Learned True Name of your one true love (Generic Female)
40 - Learned True Name of your one true love (Valen)
50 - Learned True Name of your one true love (Sleeping Man)
60 - Learned True Name of your one true love (Generic Male)
70 - Learned True Name of your one true love (No True Love)
80 - Secured the romance with your one true love
90 - Sabotaged the romance with your one true love
100 - Fell in love with someone else
110 - Botched your romance but used True Name to force it
